downloadTitle: Test Lab Guide: Set Up a Directory Synchronization Server to Sync Users with Office 365
downloadDescription: This Test Lab Guide shows you how to set up directory synchronization to Office 365 with the Directory Synchronization (or Directory Sync) tool.

downloadFile.name: Test Lab Guide-Dirsync with Password Sync for Office 365.docx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/f/a/2/fa204fc0-7e3f-40ab-a3c2-4711283a20a3/Test Lab Guide-Dirsync with Password Sync for Office 365.docx

detailsSection: When you have a mixed environment, with some workloads in the cloud and others on premises, you can control your Active Directory users on premises and synchronize updates to Office 365. This makes identity management easier. This Test Lab Guide shows you how to set up directory synchronization to Office 365 with the Directory Synchronization (or Directory Sync) tool. When you complete the guide, your Active Directory users in the CORP domain are synchronized with Office 365.
detailsSection_file_name: Test Lab Guide-Dirsync with Password Sync for Office 365.docx
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
installInstructionSection: 1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
